content: island wools swirl hat 1 skein frog tree picoboo 50 grams 116 yards sport weight needle 16 circular in size us 4 3 5mm dpns in same size size fits size 20-23 unstretched circumference 18 gauge 5 sts/inch abbreviations k2tog knit 2 stitches together yo yarn over sm slip marker cast on 88 stitches place a marker at the beginning of the row knit k2p2 ribbing for 1 inch row 1 knit to 2 stitch before the marker row 2 k2tog sm yo k6 k2tog yo k6 10 times row 3 knit1 sm and then knit until 2 stitches before marker repeat row 2 and 3 until hat measures 5 5 inches or 2 inches shorter than desired length ending with a row 3 begin decreases switch to dpns as needed row 1 k2tog sm yo k6 k2tog yo k6 9 times k2tog yo k5 row 2 k2tog sm k6 k2tog 10 times k5 77 stitches remain row 3 k2tog sm yo k5 k2tog 10 times yo k5 row 4 k1 sm and then knit until 2 stitches before marker row 5 k2tog sm yo k5 k2tog 10 times yo k4 row 6 k2tog sm k5 k2tog 10 times k4 66 stitches remain row 7 k2tog sm yo k4 k2tog 10 times yo k4 row 8 k1 sm knit until 2 stitches before the marker row 9 k2tog sm yo k4 k2tog 10 times yo k3 row 10 k2tog sm k4 k2tog 10 times k3 55 stitches remain row 11 k2tog sm yo k3 k2tog 10 times k2 row 12 k2tog sm k3 k2tog 10 times k2 44 stitches remain row 13 k2tog sm k2 k2tog yo k2 k2tog 5 times k1 38 stitches remain row 14 k2tog sm k1 k2tog k2 k2tog 5 times 27 stitches remain row 15 k2tog sm k2tog k1 k2tog 5 times 16 stitches remain row 16 k1 sm k1 k2tog 5 times 11 stitches remain cut yarn leaving a 6 tail thread it through remaining stitches pull tight and weave in ends please do not distribute this pattern do not use it or items made with it for commercial purposes © julie packard friday harbor washington copies of this pattern available through island wools friday harbor washington http //www islandwools com
